templates.name: Do you offer a trade program?
templates.content: Yes. Our Trade Program is open to interior designers, design professionals, and architects. You can read more and apply at the following link: https://www.georgjensen.com/en-us/trade-program

templates.name: Is your cutlery dishwasher safe?
templates.content: Yes, all our cutlery collections are dishwasher safe to a maximum of 130°F. Use a non-citrus, non-abrasive detergent and use the air-dry cycle. Do not use the high heat or sanitizer setting on your dishwasher. Do not let your flatware soak in water but simply rinse it off before loading into the machine. Do not use the abrasive side of your sponge on the metal or the handle. If small stains appear on the blades, these can be removed using white vinegar.

templates.name: Do you gift wrap?
templates.content: If you would like to add gift wrap to your order, you can choose "Gift wrap this item" during check-out. Some items are not eligible for gift wrapping, and this will be communicated on the product once added to the basket.

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content:
All U.S. and Canadian orders are eligible for free ground shipping to registered My Georg Jensen account holders. If you don't have an account yet, you can sign up here: https://www.georgjensen.com/en-us/mygeorgjensen

For non-account holders, you can take a look at our shipping charges here: https://www.georgjensen.com/en-us/terms-and-conditions#8

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: Unfortunately, we're unable to change an order once it's placed. I can check if a cancellation is possible. What's the order number and email address that it's under?

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/georgjensen/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/georgjensen/

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: We don't offer phone support right now but I'd be happy to help you over text, let me know what I can do for you!

templates.name: Ambassador program / affiliate
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at affiliateusa@georgjensen.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at salesus@georgjensen.com Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.georgjensen.com/en-us/exchange-and-returns

templates.name: Journey response 1,2,3 / Customer responds with 1,23
templates.content: Thanks for your feedback. Please let us know if there's anything we can do to improve your experience with Georg Jensen!

templates.name: How can I start my return
templates.content: You can start your return/exchange through this link https://georgjensen.typeform.com/to/G5pG44zo?typeform-source=www.georgjensen.com

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can find us at a store near you here:  https://www.georgjensen.com/en-us/storelocator

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: We usually ship via UPS, and once shipped it will take 4-5 business days domestically and 12-15 business days to Canada.

templates.name: Do you offer engraving?
templates.content: At the moment, we don't, but I'll definitely pass this along to the team to consider in the future!

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at  customerserviceus@georgjensen.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Order status update/tracking info
templates.content: You can email us at customerserviceus@georgjensen.com to get more information about your order.

templates.name: Where are your items made / manufactured?
templates.content: All our items are made in our two manufacturing facilities located in Hjørring, Denmark, and Chiang Mai, Thailand.

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.georgjensen.com/en-us/offers

templates.name: Size Chart: All - Clothes
templates.content: You can take a look at our size chart here: https://www.georgjensen.com/on/demandware.static/-/Library-Sites-SharedLibrary/default/dwfe297faa/pdfs/4254_GJ_RingSizer_A4_v7.pdf
